CustomField.description: Indicates the bank details statuses for all relevant clients for this fulfilment
CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS( Recommendation__r.ProductName__c , "Junior"), IF( ISPICKVAL(Recommendation__r.RegisteredContact__r.BankDetailsStatus__c, "Submitted"), "Received", "To be requested" ), IF( ISBLANK(Recommendation__r.JointOwner__c), IF( ISPICKVAL( Recommendation__r.PrimaryOwner__r.BankDetailsStatus__c , "Submitted"), "Received", "To be requested") , IF( ISPICKVAL( Recommendation__r.PrimaryOwner__r.BankDetailsStatus__c , "Submitted") && ISPICKVAL( Recommendation__r.JointOwner__r.BankDetailsStatus__c , "Submitted"), "Received", "To be requested" )))
CustomField.label: Bank details status
